text: Corycium Antrum was an inland town of ancient Cilicia, above Arima, inhabited during the Byzantine era. Its site is tentatively located near Cennet Obruğu in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cilicia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Mersin Province
title: Corycium Antrum
